search_query: Aspen Technology AZPN competitors 2025 process optimization software
context: AspenTech (NASDAQ: AZPN) is a provider of AI-based manufacturing process optimization software. Its applications utilize empirical models for chemical manufacturing processes for plant and process design, providing engineering, plant operations, and supply chain management software. Annual revenue is $1.04B as of June 30, 2023. AspenTech was acquired by Emerson on June 1, 2022. In early 2025, activist investor Elliott took a stake in Aspen Technology and pushed back on an offer from Emerson. Around the world in 2025, over 805 companies use Aspen Technology as enterprise asset management software, with 300 customers (53.96%) from the United States. Top industries include Petrochemicals, Project Management, and Refining.
